resources.string: Press Home button to use Your phone or Power button to turn off your screen - flashlight will continue to give a light. \nTo turn off the flashlight you need to press Back button from the application.

All the information what app able to give - is standard info for GooglePlay services: about phone model, about operating system version, country, ect. That info is the same for any app in GooglePlay. One-Tap Flashlight app not collect, use or sell any private information about phone owner. And this app, as it is, specially not collect any information at all. The app - is just a flashlight for phone. The only one task of the app - is to, being small and simple, give to your phone functionality of flashlight. 
 
Permission for camera is needed just for app be able to turn on camera flash, which is using as flashlight. 
 
If you have any questions about app-s Privacy Policy (the same as about the app at all) you can write to me on my email: pazukdev@gmail.com
